results.t: Pacquiao vs Ugas Results & Highlights | August 21, 2021
results.p: Aug 21, 2021 — Yordenis Ugas overwhelms eight-division world champion Manny “Pac Man” Pacquiao by way of UD, retaining his WBA World Title in their FOX Sports PPV main event.

results.t: Yordenis Ugas upsets Manny Pacquiao by decision to ...
results.p: Aug 22, 2021 — In a close fight, Yordenis Ugas retained his WBA "super" welterweight title, edging Manny Pacquiao by unanimous decision Saturday night.
